title: Public Wi-Fi Safety
VPN for Public WiFi
context: Avoid accessing sensitive information on public Wi-Fi networks. Use a VPN to encrypt your traffic when connecting to public hotspots. Be cautious about what websites you visit and avoid online banking or shopping on unsecured networks.

Always use a VPN when connecting to public WiFi networks. Public hotspots are breeding grounds for hackers who can intercept your data. A VPN encrypts your internet traffic, keeping your personal information safe from prying eyes.

content_item.context: Always use a VPN when connecting to public WiFi networks...
